titles.title: Stop Bankrupting Our Country Act
Stop Bankrupting Our Country Act
To establish a limit on increases in total Federal spending, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committees on Appropriations, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
